title: Revert action button styling to Version 335

requirements.text: Revert the action buttons in MessageBubble.tsx to their original styling from Version 335. The buttons became invisible after the layout reorder changes introduced in Version 369. Restore all button styles (colors, visibility, opacity, background, borders, hover states) to exactly how they appeared in Version 335.

quotes: The action buttons are not visible anymore. Please revert their styling back to version 335

acceptanceCriteria: All action buttons in MessageBubble are fully visible and not hidden or transparent
Button colors, backgrounds, borders, and hover states match the Version 335 appearance
Action buttons remain functional (clickable) after the styling revert
No regression in the message layout reorder (Message ID → Timestamp → Username → Avatar) introduced in Version 369

constraints: Do not alter the message header layout reorder (Message ID → Timestamp → Username → Avatar) that was introduced in Version 369
Only restore action button styling — do not change any other UI elements
nonGoals: Reverting any other changes from Version 369 beyond the action button styles
Changes to backend logic or data models
Any new features or UI enhancements beyond restoring button visibility
